com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.dhRobot

Class DHRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.Entity
      • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.physicalObject.PhysicalObject
        • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.robot.Robot
          • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.dhRobot.DHRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnectionListener, InputListener, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DHRobot_Arm3, DHRobot_Cartesian, DHRobot_GMF_M100, DHRobot_Mantis, DHRobot_Phybot, DHRobot_SCARA_NM, DHRobot_Sixi1, DHRobot_Sixi2, DHRobot_Thor, DHRobot_UArm

    public abstract class DHRobot
extends Robot
implements InputListener
    A robot designed using D-H parameters.
    Author:
    Dan Royer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • targetPose

        public javax.vecmath.Matrix4d targetPose
        the pose the IK is trying to move towards. Includes the tool held by the robot.

      • oldPose

        public javax.vecmath.Matrix4d oldPose
        the last valid pose. Used in case the IK solver fails to solve the targetPose.

      • homePose

        public javax.vecmath.Matrix4d homePose
        the pose the IK would solve when the robot is at "home" position.

      • dhTool

        protected DHTool dhTool
        a DHTool current attached to the arm.

      • drawSkeleton

        protected boolean drawSkeleton
        true if the skeleton should be visualized on screen. Default is false.

      • POSE_HISTORY_LENGTH

        public static final int POSE_HISTORY_LENGTH
        See Also:

        public abstract void sendNewStateToRobot(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Robot is connected and ready to receive. Send the current FK values to the robot. Post-process translate the FK values and send them, along with tool state, etc.
